views.markdown:
Use TouchID sensor to do some actions, like Back to Home screen, lock device, etc.


•Single Press
•Double Press
•Triple Press
•Hold
•Press & Hold
•Press & Slide in - Press then slide to screen



•Home Button - Use as Home Button
•Switcher - Toggle App Switcher
•Lock Device
•Siri - Toggle Siri
•Reachability - Activate Reachability
•Screenshot - Take screenshot
•App Back - Go back previous page in the app
•Back - Go back previous page
•Last App - Switch to previous app

Touchr also support feature called "Turn on screen", allows you to wake up or unlock device by touching the TouchID.
------------
使用指纹感应器来执行操作，如：返回Home界面，锁定机器等。



•按一下
•按两下
•按三下
•按住
•按一下并按住
•按一下并划入屏幕



•Home按钮 - 模拟按一下Home按钮
•多任务 - 激活系统多任务管理界面
•锁定机器
•Siri - 激活Siri
•便捷访问 - 激活便捷访问
•截屏
•程序内返回 - 程序内返回上一页面
•返回 - 全局返回上一页面
•上一个程序 - 切换到上一个使用的程序


Touchr还支持点亮屏幕的功能，可以通过触摸指纹感应器来点亮屏幕。


No icon is added to the homescreen. Configure options from Settings app.

不添加桌面图标，请在设置程序里面设置

- Added "Do Nothing" action - 添加“无动作”动作 - Support for iOS 8
- Added "Control Center" action
- Added "Notification Center" action
- Added "Mute" action
- Added "Flashlight" action
- Added "Lockscreen Disable" option

- 适配iOS 8
- 添加“控制中心”动作
- 添加“通知中心”动作
- 添加“静音”动作
- 添加“手电筒”动作
- 添加“锁屏禁用”设置
- Fix bugs
- 修复bug
